getStorageSlotsCallback(bytes,bytes).details: Internal callback function invoked by CCIP-Read in response to a `getStorageSlots` request.

getTarget(bytes,uint256).details: Returns the L2 target address that can answer queries for `name`.

params.name: DNS encoded ENS name to query
params.offset: The offset of the label to query recursively.

returns.target: The L2 resolver address to verify against.

resolve(bytes,bytes).details: Resolve and verify a record stored in l2 target address. It supports subname by fetching target recursively to the nearlest parent.

params.name: DNS encoded ENS name to query

params.target: The L2 resolver address to verify against.

setTarget(bytes32,address).notice: Set target address to verify aagainst
